column3: Order your companion to follow you.
Allow your companion to make his own decisions in battle.
Order your companion to focus on defensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <Color(-34022)>Defender</Color> skill tree.
Order your companion to focus more on offensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <Color(-34022)>Attacker</Color> skill tree.
Order your companion to stop fighting and concentrate on healing maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <Color(-34022)>Healer</Color> skill tree.
